about_the_game:
About This Content


Climb aboard the Hyper Networker and embark on a journey in Northwest England. Magnificent Mancunian scenery comes to life along the echoes of the fallen Woodhead Line. Surviving as part of the Northern Trains network, experience the quaint Glossop Line in Train Sim World 3!

The distinctive charm, rapid performance, and unique design of the BR Class 323 feels at home on the shuttling service of Manchester’s Glossop Line. Built by Hunslet as an EMU dedicated to modernising the North, they are a familiar sight and popular with enthusiasts. Enjoy life aboard the 323 in a compact commuter package, taking things slower and enjoying the countryside beyond the city outskirts.

Wearing the bright and bold Northern Trains livery, the BR Class 323 is the exclusive electric traction on the Glossop Line. Keep on your feet as you constantly change ends, performing unique turnback procedures at Hadfield and Glossop on the well-known triangle junction at Dinting, before making the sedate run back to the grand Manchester Piccadilly.

Rail aficionados know the Glossop Line as a remaining relic from the former Woodhead Line. Truncated at Hadfield, the old line was advanced for its day, featuring steam-era DC electrification, still somewhat present today in the form of older style gantries, albeit modified to support today’s AC technology. Enjoy what’s left of the Woodhead and its infrastructure, including the stations which are still served to this day.

Key Features


  • Complete Glossop Line between Manchester Piccadilly, Hadfield and Glossop
  • BR Class 323 EMU in Northern Trains livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorial on the Training Center
  • Includes 5 Scenarios and an authentic 24-hour Timetable
  • Experience additional layers in the timetable from multiple Add-Ons:
    • East Midlands Trains Class 158 AI at Manchester Piccadilly
    • Class 66 freight services between Manchester Piccadilly, Guide Bridge and Hyde North
    • Seasonal services such as Rail Head Treatment Trains, and the occasional Railtour
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 4GB

About This Content


Climb aboard the Hyper Networker and embark on a journey in Northwest England. Magnificent Mancunian scenery comes to life along the echoes of the fallen Woodhead Line. Surviving as part of the Northern Trains network, experience the quaint Glossop Line in Train Sim World 3!

The distinctive charm, rapid performance, and unique design of the BR Class 323 feels at home on the shuttling service of Manchester’s Glossop Line. Built by Hunslet as an EMU dedicated to modernising the North, they are a familiar sight and popular with enthusiasts. Enjoy life aboard the 323 in a compact commuter package, taking things slower and enjoying the countryside beyond the city outskirts.

Wearing the bright and bold Northern Trains livery, the BR Class 323 is the exclusive electric traction on the Glossop Line. Keep on your feet as you constantly change ends, performing unique turnback procedures at Hadfield and Glossop on the well-known triangle junction at Dinting, before making the sedate run back to the grand Manchester Piccadilly.

Rail aficionados know the Glossop Line as a remaining relic from the former Woodhead Line. Truncated at Hadfield, the old line was advanced for its day, featuring steam-era DC electrification, still somewhat present today in the form of older style gantries, albeit modified to support today’s AC technology. Enjoy what’s left of the Woodhead and its infrastructure, including the stations which are still served to this day.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 460 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K @ 3.9 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 or AMD Radeon RX 6800 with 8 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller

short_description: Climb aboard the Northern Class 323 “Hyper Networker” and embark on a journey in Northwest England. Magnificent Mancunian scenery comes to life along the quaint Glossop Line: Manchester - Hadfield & Glossop in Train Sim World 3!
